title: Metadata-Based Learning Design Tool Utilization Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening social sector job training design capabilities for corporate education administrators

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three metadata models considering the alignment of learning objectives, methods, and assessments.

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
